name: Fallen Down
description:
You are an angel, fallen from heaven into hell. Stay true to your pacifistic nature and let the demons fall into traps instead.

A shoot-em-up without any shooting.

Recomended specs:

OS: Windows 7+
Monitor Resolution:    1920x1080
Processor:                         1.0GHz+
Memory:                             525MB RAM+
DirectX Version:            9.0+
Graphics Card Vram:    50MB+
Hard Disk Space:           125MB+

Credits:
